Description:
Position Title:             Orthotics TechnicianEmployment Type:      Full TimeSalary:                         up to 5K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Al Ain, UAE About the Client:A part of an established group of companies specializing in customized footwear in the healthcare industry Job Description:Design and create custom orthotic devices to support and improve musculoskeletal function
Collaborate with healthcare professionals to assess patients' needs and conditions
Modify and fit orthotic devices, ensuring proper alignment and comfort
Maintain accurate records of patient assessments and device specifications
Contribute to enhancing patients' mobility and quality of life by addressing various medical conditionsSkills
Skills:
Open to Filipino nationals
Male, 25 to 40 years old
At least 2 years of experience in a similar role within the orthotics or footwear industry
Proficient in using various hand and power tools for crafting and modifying orthotic devices
Strong understanding of anatomy and biomechanics related to the lower limbs and feet
Knowledge of different materials commonly used in orthotic fabrication
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
